sentence: The image is a movie poster for "MASH."
At the top, in large red and yellow text, is a quote: "'MASH' IS WHAT THE NEW FREEDOM OF THE SCREEN IS ALL ABOUT!" attributed to Richard Schickel from Life magazine.
sentence_cn: 顶部用大号红色和黄色字体引用了这样一句话：“《陆军野战医院》就是银幕上的新自由！”这句话出自《生活》杂志的理查德·希克尔 (Richard Schickel)。
words: 'MASH' IS WHAT THE NEW FREEDOM OF THE SCREEN IS ALL ABOUT!

sentence: Below the quote is a large image of a human hand giving a peace sign.
sentence_cn: 这句话的下面是一张巨大的图像，画中是一只人类的手比出和平的手势。

sentence: The fingers are shaped to resemble legs, and the hand wears a combat boot, creating an anthropomorphic visual effect.
sentence_cn: 手指的形状像腿，手穿着战斗靴，营造出拟人化的视觉效果。

sentence: A military helmet with the American flag is perched on the index finger, and dog tags hang from the hand.
sentence_cn: 食指上戴着一顶印有美国国旗的军用头盔，手上挂着军队的牌子。

sentence: Several quotes from critics are printed next to the image, praising the film:
sentence_cn: 图片旁边印有数位评论家对这部电影的称赞：

sentence: - "The funniest... you will be bowled over by its wit!"
sentence_cn: - “最有趣的......你会被它的智慧所折服！”
words: The funniest... you will be bowled over by its wit!

sentence_cn: — 朱迪思·克里斯特，NBC 电视台

sentence: - "'MASH' is the best American war comedy since sound came in."
sentence_cn: - “《陆军野战医院》是自有声电影问世以来最好的美国战争喜剧。”
words: 'MASH' is the best American war comedy since sound came in.

sentence: - ¡°¡®MASH¡¯ is a cockeyed masterpiece¡ªsee it twice.¡± ¡ª Joseph Morgenstern, Newsweek
sentence_cn: - “《陆军野战医院》是一部荒诞不经的杰作——看两遍吧。”— 约瑟夫·摩根斯坦，《新闻周刊》

sentence: At the bottom of the poster, the text reads "20th Century-Fox presents MASH, An Ingo Preminger Production."
sentence_cn: 海报底部的文字写着“二十世纪福克斯出品的《陆军野战医院》，英戈·普雷明格制作”。
words: 20th Century-Fox presents MASH, An Ingo Preminger Production.

sentence: The poster lists credits for the film, including the starring actors Donald Sutherland, Elliott Gould, and Tom Skerritt, as well as the director, Robert Altman, and other key crew members.
sentence_cn: 海报列出了影片的演职员名单，包括主演唐纳德·萨瑟兰、埃利奥特·古尔德、汤姆·斯凯里特，以及导演罗伯特·奥特曼和其他主要剧组成员。
